msbt.message: So it begins, Some call it the Battle of the Bass. Others, the Clash of the Cod But here on , we just call it a Fishing Tourney. Let the best angler win!

Don't you think my hair looks good today, ?, you don't have to answer that. I'm just getting ready for the Fishing Tourney! What do you mean it's fishing for actual fish? Fishing for compliments is way more fun.

Did you know that a Fishing Tourney is coming up, ?Ahh, allow me to wax poetic for just a moment and explain how fishingis a game of love. You see, in fishing AND in love, you don't want to get too crazy at the first sign of a nibble. It takes finesse and caring—really being tuned into the subtlest clues— to land a truly special catch.
Got a pro tip on the Fishing Tourney for you, .They don't count fish that you catch beforehand, so save all your luck for the actual event.
You know how to enter the Fishing Tourney, right? You gotta go talk to C.J. in the plaza. Oh, I won't be joining this time around. I just got all the fish smell out of my clothes from last time!
